channel.title: Posts on Wood's Tea
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Wood's Tea

item.title: In which a 59 year old data science graduate student finds his way
item.description:
Coming up in September I have the fifth course of twelve in the data science master’s program at the Harvard Extension School. It’s CSCI E-89, Deep Learning. Between now and then I have a little time to brush up on some things I’ll need for that:

  • Introductory deep learning concepts so I’m not going in cold
  • Math for deep learning: linear algebra, MV calc…?
  • Python/pandas practice

I’ve also just bought a Macbook to replace the 5+ year old Windows laptop that didn’t quite cut it last semester when running ensemble models and which occasionally just goes dark and has to be shut down hard. So I’ve got some work to do getting comfortable with its OS again as well as various tools I’ll be using.
